headline: Down -5.37% in 4 Weeks, Here's Why DTE Energy (DTE) Looks Ripe for a Turnaround
summary: The heavy selling pressure might have exhausted for DTE Energy (DTE) as it is technically in oversold territory now. In addition to this technical measure, strong agreement among Wall Street analysts in revising earnings estimates higher indicates that the stock is ripe for a trend reversal.
